name: Python Developer
description:
A Dubai-based company with a team of passionate engineers that are spread across 10 countries is looking for a responsible and dedicated Python Software Engineer.

Launched in 2019, the company is interested in making high-quality open-source projects and getting a priceless experience of making full-valued products on a global market. We simplify complex things. We code on Java, React, React Native, Swift, Python, GO, Node.js and Kotlin.

The company offers room to grow, fully remote work, an opportunity to work with successful companies around the world on different projects

Requirements:

  • Django - real experience with not less than 3 years
  • FastAPI - real experience with not less than 3 years
  • Celery
  • Deep knowledge of database internals is required
  • PostgreSQL - real experience with not less than 3 years
  • Redis - real experience not less than 1 year
  • Kafka - real experience not less than 1 year
  • Docker - real experience not less than 1 year
  • English B1.

What you will do:

  • Software development
  • Highload and high available web stack services to support various customer journeys (Identity Management, Billing Management)
  • Trading interfaces (trading terminals) and APIs
  • Supporting and back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office and Core Banking)
  • Internal auxiliary libraries, tools, integrations, interfaces, and frameworks supporting all components and services.

It's full-time position.

Flexible work schedule. 100% remote & no time trackers.
